old:
あんたもモノ好きね
こんなとこ、何しに来たの
column2:
You like things too.
What are you doing here?
speaker: Urda

old:
散策場所、多いでしょ、ここ
地下墓地とか遺跡とか
column2:
There are a lot of places to explore, right here
, like catacombs and ruins.
speaker: Urda

column2: Are you going to go all of it?
speaker: Urda

old:
そういえばさ、怖い話があったっけ
村の北に《歌姫の崖座》っていう
場所があんの
column2:
You know, there's a scary story
about a place north of the village called "The Cliff Seat of the Diva"
speaker: Urda

old:
恐ろしげな女の声が響いた時
外に出てた村人――半分くらいが
「持って行かれた」んだってさ
column2:
When the scary woman's voice sounded
the villagers who were outside--about half of them--were
"taken away."
speaker: Urda

old: 相当前の話らしいけどさ
column2: It seems to be a story from a while ago.
speaker: Urda
